programme.title: 'Neath the Arizona Skies
programme.desc: A cowboy escorts a young half-Native American girl, whose mother has recently died. He must find her white father in order to claim her hefty inheritance.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Attacked by Shoshones while crossing a burial ground, Adam discovers that the "Indian" woman tending him is white.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe runs into romantic complications when he tries to teach a deaf girl (Stella Stevens) sign language; guest Albert Salmi.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: A member of the notorious Wild Bunch bandit gang escapes from Ranger Clint Travis' custody, resulting in his being fired. Furious, Travis sets out to take on the whole gang.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When Mexican revolutionary Juan Morales plans to topple the Mexican government, Travis takes up the disguise of a gun smuggler to stop him.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Harry Tracy terrorized America's northwest at the end of the 19th century; Matt and a posse have corner the outlaw.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie follow Butch Cassidy to South America.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity leads an angry farmer to decide that Jim must marry his daughter in a shotgun wedding.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: Jim is asked to protect a group of travelers from a bandit preying on people along the road to Natchez.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: Jim's family takes on the local saloonkeeper, who has different visions of the town's future.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: Jim assists farmers who are being forced to pay protection money to an old woman who threatens to unleash the ghost of a Louisiana pirate on them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: President Jackson asks Jim's friend to prevent a group of planters from seceding from the union.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: While traveling along the Mississippi, Jim is bushwhacked by settlers who accuse him of being a land-grabber.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: While traveling to New Orleans, Jim encounters two women from a school, searching for one of their students, who is planning to elope.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: Jim learns that a slave he had freed has been recaptured and is about to be sold at a slave auction.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: Jim goes in search of a gang of river pirates who've stolen his cargo.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: Jim is distracted by a beautiful woman while traveling to New Orleans to buy an estate.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: Jim sets out to find the thief who stole the Christmas gift he purchased for his mother.

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: Bowie aids a French boy and his aunt who are victimized by confidence tricksters.

programme.title: West Of Wyoming
programme.desc: With a crew of killers masquerading as ranch hands, Simon Miller runs a large ranch near Mesatown, while his henchmen carry out his plan to steal all of gold-bearing property of his neighboring ranchers.

programme.title: Over the Border
programme.desc: A Wells Fargo guard (Johnny Mack Brown) confronts the thieves who robbed his employer to fund their operation to smuggle silver across the Mexican border.

programme.title: The Frontiersmen
programme.desc: Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) and his sidekicks (George Hayes, Russell Hayden) stop rustlers and help a schoolmarm tame singing boys.

programme.title: Shotgun Slade
programme.desc: Slade is hired by an old friend to investigate problems at a local mine.

programme.title: Shotgun Slade
programme.desc: Slade is hired as a bodyguard to protect a singer whose life has been threatened.

programme.title: Shotgun Slade
programme.desc: A woman hires a vicious killer to murder her fiancee.

programme.title: Shotgun Slade
programme.desc: Slade is transporting an embezzler when train robbers release his prisoner.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: An outlaw forces Roy to track down his missing horse.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Dale helps a falsely accused man escape from jail.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Doc Stevens' traveling store has a more sinister purpose.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: The local postmaster plots to rob a train carrying a valuable bank shipment.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: A man is falsely imprisoned on a murder charge, then escapes to join an outlaw gang and unmask the real killer.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: The story of Sila and Firman, two child jockeys living in the impoverished island of Sumbawa, where horse racing with young children is a long-established tradition. The stakes are high, but it's the riders who pay the price.

programme.title: 'Neath the Arizona Skies
programme.desc: A cowboy escorts a young half-Native American girl, whose mother has recently died. He must find her white father in order to claim her hefty inheritance.

programme.title: The Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: A cowboy (John Wayne) protects a girl (Sheila Terry) and her father (George Hayes) from a rustler and a sheriff.

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: Government agent Randy Bowers (John Wayne) is accused of shooting up a saloon and has to escape from the jail to find the man behind the murders.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: Marshal John Travers investigates the murder of a town's sheriff, makes it his mission to restore order to the town and bring down a bandit called the Shadow.

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is asked to search for missing people in Canada, and quickly finds out a gang of French Canadian outlaws have been kidnapping people.
